entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Tabs defined in AppShell.xaml does not invoke its view model's IQueryAttributable.ApplyQueryAttributes(query) implementaion #13537
  • Java.Lang.RuntimeException Message=Canvas: trying to use a recycled bitmap android.graphics.Bitmap@5d9bccf #13534
  • FileSystem.OpenAppPackageFileAsync -- Not on windows! #13533
  • GitHub Azure DevOps workflow exclusions are ignored #13532
    Backlog
  • DisposeAsync() on IJSObjectReference causes hanging when called on Android 11 and lower on app suspension #13529
  • Possible Memory Leak on iOS and macCatalyst #13520
    Backlog
  • MAPS Control not working #13517
  • Possibility to send basic authentication headers with Browser.Default.OpenAsync() #13515
    Backlog
  • Visual Studio cannot launch Android Emulator #13511

Closed

  • Unable to reflect assembly of MAUI application on macOS #12317
  • New Visual Studio 2022 Install - Cannot publish any .NET 7 MAUI Blazor app for Windows _GenerateAppxPackage #12625
  • AVFoundation Migration to .NET 7 Maui #12969
  • .NET MAUI app's UI Automation hierarchy has a root window element with no accessible name #12973
    Backlog
  • MAUI dotnet Publish Signs msix but the exe is not Signed #13462
  • [iOS] Grid cannot be scrolled properly in a scroll view #7373
  • Page.BackgroundColor and others not reacting to changes in Application.Current.UserAppTheme #6596
    .NET 8 Planning
  • SensorSpeed intervals are different on every platform (and some are too large) #12281
    Backlog
  • Custom gestures on image in carousel not responding/working #13504
    Backlog
  • Nuget Microsoft.WindowsAppSDK Error #13382
  • Frame missing its bottom edge #9099
  • ScrollView inside a Grid with multiple Rows and Columns not working #7607
  • Android crash - Fatal signal 11 (SIGSEGV), code 1 (SEGV_MAPERR) #13131
  • help the app dont want to run #13289

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix test runner issues around our stubbed windows #13536
    backport/suggested
  • Handled x:ClassModifier attribute to set the visibility of rootType #13531
    area/Xaml </>, community ✨
  • [windows] fix memory leak when `CollectionView.ItemsSource` changes #13530
    platform/windows 🪟, area/perf 🏎️, area/collectionview 📃
  • [net7.0] Let the Grid skip * measurements during the first pass if they'll be overwritten later #13523
    area/layout 🔲
  • [net7.0] Source Generator Cancellation #13522
  • Change Windows WebView Cookies to CoreWebView2 #13518
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-webview
  • [Windows] Fix Picker alignment issues #13516
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-picker
  • Fixed ResourceDictionary.ContainsKey method #13512
    t/bug, area/Xaml </>
  • Add Pages VC View opposed to the handlers view #13510
  • [templates] Fix applicationId template option #13509
    area/templates 📄
  • Bump Microsoft.WindowsAppSDK from 1.2.230118.102 to 1.2.230217.4 #13508
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget

Merged

  • Remove not used macOS Gallery app head #13527
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Add Shell.Title to default template #13521
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/a11y, area/templates 📄
  • Remove not used WPF Gallery app head #13525
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Remove not used GTK Gallery app head #13526
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Updated news #13519
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Tag Dave Britch for breaking changes #13506
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • SensorSpeed: unify sensor intervals across all platforms #13372
    t/breaking 💥, area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
  • Include border size in Frame's measurement #13419
    area/layout 🔲
  • move BootstrapHelper to Maui Core #13431
    partner/hot-reload-xaml

Updated

  • [Housekeeping] Alternative to #11795 #12134
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [Android & iOS] Fix focus issues with DatePicker and TimePicker #13321
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-datetimepicker
  • Shell routing and Service registration automation #13402
    area/shell 🐢, community ✨
  • [controls] fix memory leak in `Window` #13400
    area/perf 🏎️
  • Fix syncing modal stack when the window is created/recreated #13025
    t/breaking 💥, area/modal, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • [iOS] Scroll with the keyboard to not block entries and editors #13499
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, layout-scrollview, keyboard
  • Show keyboard on Android entry/editor/searchbar focus #12890
    area/controls 🎮
  • Add legacy Grid method (and a better one) #13408
    area/layout 🔲, layout-grid
  • [iOS] Fix SearchBar focus issues #11698
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • [Windows] Fix Button LineBreakMode property #10759
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • Use the TextColor value to set the ClearButton color on the Entry #13475
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • Allow string property binding as Color source #9814
    t/bug, area/Xaml </>
  • [Android] Fixed SwipeItems size dynamically changing the Content Margin #13501
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview
  • Changes how propagate brushes changes #12714
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, area/perf 🏎️
  • [Android] Allow to update Entry Background (once established) #12227
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, area/controls 🎮
  • Avoid crash using BoxView visibility (avoid unnecessary parent) #11439
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮
  • [Housekeeping] Port latest fixes from Xamarin.Forms to .NET MAUI #11420
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [Windows] Changes in SwipeViewHandler #11229
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview
  • [Android] Fix RequestedThemeChanged event #11200
    t/bug, area/Xaml </>, platform/android 🤖
  • [macOS/iOS] Fix RequestedThemeChanged event #11199
    t/bug, area/Xaml </>
  • Implement Keyboard on SearchBarHandler #9851
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • Remove "IsPresented/ShouldShowSplitMode" check #13497
    area/FlyoutPage
  • [iOS] Don't scroll more than the available scrollable space #13415
    area/layout 🔲, platform/iOS 🍎, layout-scrollview
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #13434
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Removing skip attribute from color validation tests #13266
  • Simplification of user interface declaration in code #12728
    proposal/open, community ✨
